summary: Voss entices local gamers to create a Utopian society in an attempt to impress a potential employer, but paradise is disrupted when his nemesis lays claim to the city and Voss's true love.
cast: Jon Gries|Matt Mattson|Clint Vanderlinden|Steve Berg|Missy Hill|Niklaas Duncan|Devin McGinn|Jaclyn Hales|R.J. Baker|Kenneth F. Brown|James Jamison|Colleen Baum|Tom Markus|Kevin Weisman|Paul Mulder|Alesandra Durham|William Rubio|Alton Barnhart|Emily Burnworth|Eric Dunton|Dashiell Wolf|Robbie Bagley|Jason Tatum|Davis Johnson|Ty Munson|Elizabeth Lefler|Margaret Smith|Dan Larrinaga|Seth Dahle|Brandon Habermeyer|Rachel Lockhart|Jacob Boettcher|Weston Buswell|Adam Colvin|Brandyn Cross|Bryce Hess|Sean D. Hunter|Tony Knight|Seanna Ladd|James C. Morris|Kjirstin Youngberg|Jessica Emilie Zarnofsky
title: Unicorn City
